title: France's Nations League Blues Continue
description:
The FC crew react to another disappointing performance by France in the Nations League as the title holders fell to Denmark again and will not defend their title in June. Plus, the guys recap a pair of 1-0 wins as Robert Lewandowski stars with a brilliant assist and argue if a late Virgil van Dijk winner can get the defender's form back on track.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Denmark beat France again in the Nations League; Van Dijk header takes Netherlands past Belgium; Brilliant Lewandowski assists takes Poland past Wales
